list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: when did you last see him?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lần cuối bạn thấy anh ta là khi nào?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: at or on which (referring to a time or circumstance).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Saturday is the day when I get my hair done
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thứ bảy là ngày tôi làm tóc xong

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: at or during the time that.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I loved math when I was in school
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi yêu toán học khi tôi ở trường

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: after which; and just then (implying suddenness).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had just drifted off to sleep when the phone rang
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta vừa trôi đi để ngủ khi điện thoại reo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in view of the fact that; considering that.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm saying it now when I should have told you long ago
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đang nói bây giờ khi tôi nên nói với bạn từ lâu
